returns.upkeepNeeded: as true if performUpkeep() needs to be called, false otherwise. performData returned empty.

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Checks if PrizePools require upkeep. Call in a static manner every block by the Chainlink Upkeep network.

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Performs upkeep on the prize pools.

userdoc.notice: Contract implements Chainlink's Upkeep system interface, automating the upkeep of PrizePools in the associated registry.
